title: Shea Moisture Organic Yucca & Aloe Thickening Growth Milk
description: This product is for thin, fine hair and is color-safe. It thickens, volumizes and softens. This product does not contain parabens, phthalates, paraffin, gluten, propylene glycol, mineral oil, synthetic fragrance, animal testing, PABA, synthetic color, DEA, animal ingredients or sulfates.

title: Shea Moisture Raw Shea Butter Baby Head-to-Toe Wash & Shampoo - 13 oz
description: Shea Moisture Raw Shea Chamomile & Argan Oil Baby Head-To-Toe Wash & Shampoo.Shea Moisture established 1912.Calm & comfort.

title: GPB (Glycogen Protein Balance) Conditioner Jumbo Size - 16 oz - Liquid
description: For years, people have sworn by this ultra-nourishing conditioner made with two kinds of protein-lactalbumin (a milk protein) and glycogen from oyster shells. High in sulfur-rich amino acids and other nutrients, GPB is the solution to dry, chemically-treated hair and split ends. (Not a vegan product.)   INGREDIENTS: Essential Fatty Acid Base (with Amino Acids Cysteine, Cystine and Methionine), Lactalbumin (milk protein), Rosemary, Sage, Horsetail, Coltsfoot, Nettle, Glycogen (from oyster shells), Balsam Tolu, Aubrey's Preservative (Citrus Seed Extract, Vitamins A, C and E).
